item.title: 淡水河谷首席执行官将留任至 2024 年，矿商正在寻找继任者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，淡水河谷公司首席执行官爱德华多-巴托洛梅奥将留任至 12 月，同时这家全球最大的矿业公司之一正在寻找继任者。【原文：Vale SA Chief Executive Officer Eduardo Bartolomeo will retain his job through December while one of the world’s biggest mining companies conducts a search for a successor, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 越南争取升级为新兴市场面临现实考验
item.description: 越南争取被纳入新兴市场指数的时间正在流逝，其对股票投资者预付资金的要求是一个关键的绊脚石。【原文：The clock is ticking on Vietnam’s pursuit of inclusion in emerging market indexes, with its demand for upfront funding by equity investors a key stumbling block.】

item.title: 富达裁员约 700 人，2017 年以来首次裁员
item.description: 富达投资公司（Fidelity Investments）本周裁员约 700 人，这是该公司七年来首次裁员。【原文：Fidelity Investments cut about 700 jobs this week, its first headcount reduction in seven years.】

item.title: 与熏制房火灾有关的 Xcel 电线杆出现 "腐烂 "现象
item.description: 据德克萨斯州 A&M 林业局的一份调查报告称，Xcel 能源公司拥有的一根木质电线杆在大风中倒塌，引发了德克萨斯州历史上最严重的野火。【原文：A wooden utility pole owned by Xcel Energy Inc. that toppled during high winds and sparked the worst wildfire in Texas history appeared to be decayed at its base where it broke and fell over, according to a Texas A&M Forest Service investigative report.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉副总统拒绝接受关于通货紧缩的私人报告
item.description: 委内瑞拉副总统德尔西-罗德里格斯（Delcy Rodríguez）周五驳斥了一个由反对派领导的研究小组的调查结果，该小组的调查显示，2月份消费价格陷入通货紧缩。【原文：Venezuela’s Vice President Delcy Rodríguez on Friday rejected the findings of an opposition-led research group that showed consumer prices slipped into deflation in February.】

item.title: 拜登预测美联储将降息
item.description: 乔-拜登总统预测美联储将采取降息行动，因为政府在与唐纳德-特朗普的选举斗争中更加重视住房成本。【原文：President Joe Biden predicted the Federal Reserve would move to cut rates, as the administration places greater emphasis on housing costs in its election fight against Donald Trump.】

item.title: TikTok 如何成为美中国家安全问题
item.description: 短视频平台 TikTok 要么是愚蠢舞蹈和化妆教程的展示平台，要么是对美国国家安全的复杂威胁，这取决于你问的是谁。由于 TikTok 公司由中国公司字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd. —）所有，而且中国要求其公司应要求与政府共享任何与国家安全相关的数据— TikTok 在美国人中的流行所产生的影响超出了手机屏幕的范围。此外，家长、教育工作者和媒体也在为 TikTok 的流行而忧心忡忡。【原文：Depending on whom you ask, the short-form video platform TikTok is either a showcase for goofy dances and makeup tutorials or a sophisticated threat to US national security. Because TikTok Inc. is owned by a Chinese company, ByteDance Ltd. — and because China requires its companies, upon request, to share any national security-related data with the government — TikTok’s popularity among Americans carries implications beyond the mobile-phone screen. That’s on top of hand-wringing by parents, educ】

item.title: 鲁宾斯坦主导的收购 MLB 金莺队交易获得重要批准
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国职业棒球大联盟所有权委员会已批准凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Major League Baseball’s ownership committee has approved the purchase of a controlling stake in the Baltimore Orioles by Carlyle Group Inc. co-founder David Rubenstein and a consortium of investors in a deal that values the team at $1.73 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 土耳其转向正统经济后赢得惠誉评级
item.description: 惠誉上调了土耳其的信用评级，因为政府回归正统经济政策降低了金融稳定风险和国际收支压力。【原文：Turkey’s credit rating was upgraded by Fitch, as the government’s return to orthodox economic policy reduces financial stability risks and balance-of-payments pressures.】

item.title: 美国呼吁海地总理支持政治过渡
item.description: 美国国务卿安东尼-布林肯敦促海地总理支持将导致重新选举的政治进程，这表明美国已对他管理该国最新危机的能力失去信心。【原文：Secretary of State Antony Blinken urged Haiti’s prime minister to support a political process that would lead to fresh elections, signaling the US has lost faith in his ability to manage the country’s latest crisis.】

item.title: 对冲基金因欧佩克动向将看跌美国石油的押注降至十月低点
item.description: 欧佩克及其盟国延长减产后，对冲基金将看跌美国原油的押注降至五个月来最低。【原文：Hedge funds slashed their bearish bets on US crude to the lowest in five months after OPEC and its allies extended production cuts.】

item.title: 市场涨幅扩大，鲍威尔在华尔街无人不惊
item.description: 如果有人打赌，本周鹰派人物杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）会给华尔街带来恐慌，那他就会失望而归。【原文：Anyone betting that a hawked-up Jerome Powell would strike fear on Wall Street this week was left disappointed.】

item.title: 重组 "几成定局"，乌克兰遭 S&P 公司裁员
item.description: S&P全球评级公司下调了乌克兰的信用评级，称乌克兰政府 "几乎肯定 "会将欧洲债券持有人纳入其债务减免努力中。【原文：Ukraine’s credit rating was cut by S&P Global Ratings, which said it’s a “virtual certainty” the government will include holders of Eurobonds in its debt-relief efforts.】

item.title: 特朗普寻求上诉，关注债券市场的一小块蛋糕
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最近在法庭上的两次败诉以及他现在欠下的巨额法律债务，让保险市场上一个不起眼的领域--上诉保证金--成为焦点。【原文：Donald Trump’s two recent courtroom losses and the staggering legal debts he now owes have put the spotlight on an obscure segment of the insurance market — the appeal bond.】

item.title: Cathie Wood 认为半导体股票有调整风险
item.description: Cathie Wood 说，随着技术供应链的复苏，半导体股票可能会经历一次市场调整。【原文：Cathie Wood says semiconductor stocks may endure a market correction as the supply chain for the technology perks up.】

item.title: 纳皮尔-帕克认为信贷投资组合将产生类似股票的回报率
item.description: Napier Park Global Capital 首席投资官乔纳森-多夫曼（Jonathan Dorfman）表示，自 2008 年金融危机以来，投资者首次可以组建能够产生类似股票回报的信贷投资组合。【原文：For the first time since the 2008 financial crisis, investors can assemble credit portfolios capable of producing equity-like returns, according to Jonathan Dorfman, chief investment officer at Napier Park Global Capital.】

item.title: 拉米雷斯挖掘更多花旗公共融资银行家以拓展公共融资业务
item.description: Samuel A. Ramirez & Co. 公司又从花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Samuel A. Ramirez & Co. has hired three more bankers and an analyst from Citigroup Inc., the latest in a number of additions to the firm that is seizing on municipal finance heavyweights pulling back from the space.】

item.title: 萨默斯称美联储中性立场 "错误"，对降息押注发出警告
item.description: 前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）说，美联储对利率中性设定的估计偏离了预期，决策者今年最终不下调基准利率的可能性越来越大。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers said that the Federal Reserve is well off on its estimate of a neutral setting for interest rates, and that there’s an increasing chance that policymakers don’t end up lowering their benchmark this year.】

item.title: 奇货通讯：是时候讨论宽松的金融条件了
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: TPG 正在讨论收购合作伙伴集团旗下的 Techem 公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，TPG 公司正在洽谈收购德国计量公司 Techem GmbH。【原文：TPG Inc. is in talks to acquire German metering company Techem GmbH, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街认为美元在本周大跌后将下跌但不会出局
item.description: 尽管美元遭遇了今年以来最严重的暴跌，但华尔街还没有准备好全力押注看跌美元。【原文：Wall Street isn’t ready to go all in on bearish dollar bets even as the currency suffers from the worst selloff this year.】

item.title: 英国央行文件称，英国央行和美联储在量化宽松之前开始加息是错误的
item.description: 英国央行自己的一位研究人员表示，英国央行和美联储在开始放松量化宽松政策之前就加息是错误的。【原文：The Bank of England and the Federal Reserve were wrong to raise interest rates before starting to unwind quantitative easing, according to one of the BOE’s own researchers.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚 Ecopetrol 石油公司因天然气供应减少正在研究进口天然气方案
item.description: Ecopetrol SA 公司的一位官员说，该公司正在分析进口天然气的不同方案，同时哥伦比亚加勒比海水域的油井开始生产天然气燃料。【原文：Ecopetrol SA is analyzing different options to import natural gas while wells in Colombia’s Caribbean waters begin producing the fuel, a company official said.】

item.title: 精神航空的命运可能取决于与债务人达成的未经考验的协议
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines Inc. 与捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways Corp.他们希望得到很多回报。【原文：Short on time and running out of options after its scuttled merger with JetBlue Airways Corp., Spirit Airlines Inc. is left looking to debtholders for a lifeline. They will want a lot in return.】

item.title: 销售增长担忧加剧，Abercrombie 511% 的涨势降温
item.description: Abercrombie & Fitch Co.股价大涨的势头正在减弱，因为华尔街担心该零售商能否继续实现强劲的销售增长，以证明其高昂的估值是合理的。【原文：A blistering rally in Abercrombie & Fitch Co. shares is losing steam as Wall Street frets over the retailer’s ability to keep delivering strong sales growth to justify its high valuation.】

item.title: 美国失业率两年来最高背后并非全是坏消息
item.description: 美国 2 月份的就业率攀升至两年来的新高。这对失业者来说是一个挫折，但并不意味着劳动力市场的末日来临。【原文：The US employment rate climbed to a two-year high in February. It’s a setback for those who lost their jobs, but it hardly signaled doom and gloom in the labor market.】

item.title: 公共部门招聘推动加拿大劳动力市场发展
item.description: 上个月，公共部门就业人数的增长超过了加拿大企业就业人数的减少，这凸显出劳动力市场受到了政府招聘的支撑。【原文：Employment gains in the public sector more than offset losses among Canadian businesses last month, highlighting a labor market that has been propped up by government hiring.】

item.title: 卢拉的巴西国家石油公司董事否决特别股息提案
item.description: 周四，与路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）政府结盟的巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）董事会成员否决了市场期待的支付特别股息的提议。【原文：Petroleo Brasileiro SA board members aligned with the government of Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva shot down a proposal Thursday to pay special dividends the market was expecting.】

item.title: EQT 希望长期持有私募股权投资获胜者
item.description: EQT AB 对欧洲资本市场的现状感到非常沮丧，因此正在探索建立一种结构，使其能够更长期地持有某些资产。【原文：EQT AB is so frustrated with the state of capital markets in Europe that it’s exploring the creation of structures that would allow it to hold certain assets for longer.】

item.title: 光速聘请埃利奥特的 Isaac Kim 推动技术收购
item.description: 据知情人士透露，光速创投（Lightspeed Venture Partners）聘请了埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的艾萨克-金（Isaac Kim），因为这家风险投资公司计划进军以技术为重点的杠杆收购领域。【原文：Lightspeed Venture Partners hired Elliott Investment Management’s Isaac Kim as the venture capital firm plans a foray into technology-focused leveraged buyouts, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
